mapper.select: SELECT id as user_id, user_name, nick_name as alias_name FROM maoding_web_account WHERE status='0' and id=#{userId}

SELECT a.id as company_user_id, b.id as user_id, b.user_name as user_name, ifnull(a.user_name,b.nick_name) as alias_name FROM ( SELECT id,user_id,user_name FROM maoding_web_company_user WHERE id=#{companyUserId} LIMIT 1 ) a INNER JOIN maoding_web_account b on (b.status='0' and a.user_id=b.id)

SELECT a.id as company_user_id, b.id as user_id, b.user_name as user_name, ifnull(a.user_name,b.nick_name) as alias_name FROM ( SELECT id,user_id,user_name FROM maoding_web_company_user WHERE company_id=#{companyId} and user_id=#{userId} LIMIT 1 ) a INNER JOIN maoding_web_account b on (b.status='0' and a.user_id=b.id)
